name: Highway Bike Stunt Racer
description:
Highway Trail Bike Racer is addictive modern racing simulation and ultimate stunt dirt bike racing game. In this stunt arena to perform some crazy stunts with crazy dirt bike and win the championship race. Trail stunt bikes of this game are packed with physics based engine and dynamical characteristics. Extreme bike stunt racing being a free reckless motorbike racing simulator 3D takes you on adrenaline filled sports bike racing adventure. Put on stunt biker outfit and get yourself the best real stunt heavy bike 3D and race fast as the best racer and top hero speed stunt bike in bike xtreme asphalt racing.
Strap your bike helmet mount your superbike with style and get ready to burn highway trail. Highway Trail Bike Racer is fastest racing game on thrilling and adventurous tracks. Join this xtreme bike racing challenge for some real nerve racking adrenaline pumping adventure. Drive your motorbike in first person perspective through perilous tracks and skillfully play multiple levels in this highly challenging bike race championship. Highway Trail Bike Racer combines with stunning HD quality graphics that let you explores a whole new world while riding the best heavy motorbike racing also combining the laws of physics when racing in an actual bike on the highway. Control super bike racing on detailed asphalt tracks by avoiding or smashing opponent bike riders with insane stunt action to win this championship race.
Get ready to ride in extreme superbike racing game dashing rivals with race adventure, lots of real life action, eye catching stunts and thrill on amazingly detailed modern racing tracks in bike racing game. Earn cash in races tournaments and in head to head duels. Prove yourself as the best extreme rider in Highway Trail Bike Racer. Racing best in bike action game. Complete previous level to get into next level, every next level is much more challenging and strategic demanding than the previous one. Complete all the levels by achieving challenging objectives and performing stunts on dangerous tracks riding against professional riders to become best moto racer in stunt racing games. Hit the road with sound of super bike when engine is at full throttle and feel the smell of asphalt in best of thrilling bike racing games.
Game Play:
• Tilt right/left to steer the bike left/right
• Touch brake button to slow down or reverse heavy bike
Features of Highway Trail Bike Racer Game:
• Stunning 3D HD quality graphics
• Physics based controls
• Smooth and realistic physics based simulations used
• Crisp, Cinema like, HD visuals exciting racing tracks
• Fast and thrilling detailed asphalt tracks
• Various challenging missions
• High definition 3D view with stunning and cool graphics
• Easy to learn and drive
